definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy

sentences.english: Ipanema Beach in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil, at night.
sentences.chinese: 巴西里约热内卢的伊帕内玛海滩的夜晚。

sentences.english: The slate in 2016, held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 2016年夏奥会在巴西的里约热内卢举行。

sentences.english: The technology is currently being trialled at a clinic in Rio de Janeiro.
sentences.chinese: 这项技术目前正在里约热内卢的一个诊所进行测试。

sentences.english: Towns situated in the hills near Rio de Janeiro were worst hit.
sentences.chinese: 位在里约热内卢市附近的山丘城镇，灾情最为惨重。

sentences.english: The only other blue macaw is in Rio de Janeiro.
sentences.chinese: 仅存的另一只蓝色金刚鹦鹉在里约热内卢。

sentences.english: Ipanema Beach in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil, at night
sentences.chinese: 巴西里约热内卢的伊帕内玛海滩的夜晚。

sentences.english: Rio de Janeiro was the capital of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 里约热内卢是巴西的旧国。

sentences.english: The next edition will take place in July 2011 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 下一版将在2011年7月在里约热内卢，巴西举行。

sentences.english: The main attraction here is Rio's most recognisable symbol, Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer). (Jesus Ochoa/LPI)
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督像是里约热内卢最易识别的象征。

sentences.english: Here, a favela in Rio de Janeiro is transformed by dozens of images.
sentences.chinese: 几十幅图像改变了里约热内卢的贫民区形象。

sentences.english: Biodiversity was the buzzword of the Rio Earth Summit.
sentences.chinese: 宭生物多样性是里约热内卢地球峰会上的时髦词儿。

sentences.english: Tiago, who was on vacation in Rio de Janiero, also refused to comment.
sentences.chinese: 蒂亚戈，谁是度假的里约热内卢，也拒绝发表评论。

sentences.english: Brazilian children play in a Rio de Janeiro favela.
sentences.chinese: 里约热内卢贫民窟里孩童们在玩耍。

sentences.english: I went down to Brazil and spent two weeks with my family in Rio de Janeiro.
sentences.chinese: 我去了巴西里约热内卢，跟我的家人在那呆了两周。

sentences.english: Rio de Janeiro is a big natural harbour.
sentences.chinese: 里约热内卢是一个天然大海港。

sentences.english: Samba drummers liven up the atmosphere on Ipanema Beach in Rio de Janeiro.
sentences.chinese: 鼓手使有生机的气氛中在玛海滩位于里约热内卢。

pinyin: Bu4 yi2 nuo4 si1 Ai4 li4 si1

definition: Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
Rio/abbr. for 里約熱內盧|里约热内卢[Li3 yue1 re4 nei4 lu2]
agreement between the residents of a 里[li3], an administrative district under a city or town (Tw)
La Paz, administrative capital of Bolivia
